newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuelan oil basket rises $1.00 to $20.05 in wk.
newsitem.headline: Venezuelan oil basket rises $1.00 to $20.05 in wk.

text.p: The average export price for Venezuela's basket of crude and products rose $1.00 to $20.05 on Friday, compared to $19.05 on Aug 30, the Energy and Mines Ministry said.
The average price for the year so far is $17.23 per barrel, the ministry statement said.
Venezuela's oil export price averaged $14.84 per barrel last year compared to $13.23 per barrel in 1994.
The Venezuelan government has based its revised 1996 budget calculations on an average price of $15.60 per barrel.
